mapper.select: select SECCODE, #{type} type, F006V content, REPLACE(F003D, '-', '') releaseDate, REPLACE(F003D, '-', '') order_date, REPLACE(F003D, '-', '') date1, null date2, XDBMASK sxdbmask, md5(concat(#{code}, x.SECCODE, x.F003D)) uni from vv_uts.XNHK0127 x where F003D is not null and x.xdbmask > #{dbmask} order by x.xdbmask
